description: This apartment is in the perfect location: the block ends in Prospect Park and there's a subway stop on the convenient B/Q line just across the street. It's in an up-and-coming neighborhood near museums, Barclay's Center, and Manhattan. I am a long time host with lots of good reviews. I am traveling over Thanksgiving, putting up my whole apartment for the first time.
name: Neat and Massive on Prospect Park
